name: Project H (Shoebby)
description:
Summary

In this First-Person Platformer use push and pull grenades to propel yourself through 17 levels of increasing difficulty. Enjoy the trippy visual style and the physics-based movement system!

This is a demo meant to give an impression of the potential full game, feedback and other comments are greatly appreciated!

Team Purple Apple Aran YilmazerliGame & Audio DesignMalebo Em BotdenUX/UI DesignRowin van der ScheeGame Design & VFXThomas van EekelenVisual & Level Design
